meanings.definition: Used to express confidence or certainty in a statement.
meanings.sent1: I betcha it will rain today.
meanings.sent2: I betcha you can do it!
meanings.sent3: Betcha the sun will rise tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: Her smile betcha she knew the secret.
meanings.sent5: I betcha the cat will chase the mouse.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate agreement or understanding.
meanings.sent2: Betcha, I see what you mean.
meanings.sent3: Betcha, we're on the same page.
meanings.sent4: His nod was a betcha to continue.

meanings.definition: Used to suggest a strong likelihood or probability.
meanings.sent1: I betcha it's going to be a busy day.
meanings.sent2: I betcha it's going to snow soon.
meanings.sent3: Betcha the store will close early today.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds betcha a storm is coming.
meanings.sent5: I betcha the bus will be late again.
